questions.question_text: How is a group defined in ServiceNow?

choices.B: A group is one record stored in the Group [sys_user_group] table
choices.D: A group defines a set of users that share the same job title
choices.A: A group is one record stored in the Group Type [sys_user_group_type] table
choices.C: A group defines a set of users that share the same location

discussion.content:

A and C are written the same

questions.question_text: What is a role in ServiceNow?

choices.D: A role is a persona used in Live Feed Chat
choices.C: A role is one record in the Role [sys_user_role] table
choices.A: A role is one record in the Role [user_sys_role] table
choices.B: A role is a set of modules for a particular application

choices.C: A message through Connect related to a Change Request
choices.B: A tool for alerting users that events that concern them have occurred
choices.A: A new Knowledge article created by a Business Rule

In Washington DC release we know only Freeform Board and Data Driven Board

Types of Visual Task Boards include Flexible, Freeform, Guided. So that, featured is not a type of VTB
The VTB types in Tokyo are Freeform Board and Data Driven Board
C is correct, as featured is not a type of VTB
